About

Taewook Kim is a prospective Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology(HKUST) from Fall 2018. He will be advised by Prof. Xiaojuan Ma as a member of the HCI group.

His research interests lie in Human-Computer Interaction, Interactive System, and Computational Linguistics. He earned his B.S. in Business Administration and B.S. in Computer Science and Engineering from Hanyang University on February 2018.
